header_text: You have a one-on-one meeting today with your intimidating boss, which you are nervous about. During the meeting, you momentarily lose your train of thought. After that, your anxiety is tolerable.

elements.Text: Are you able to tolerate your anxiety while meeting with your boss?

elements.name: You have a one-on-one meeting today with your intimidating boss, which you are nervous about. During the meeting, you momentarily lose your train of thought. After that, your anxiety is tolerable._Work/Career Development_comp_question
